subtitle: A wonderful array of ingredients including crispy bacon, avocado and watercress in this nutritious salad.

method.text: Grill the bacon for 3-5 min or until crisp and cooked. Leave to cool.
Using a pair of scissors, cut the bacon into strips.
In a large salad bowl, toss together the bacon, watercress, chicory, lettuce, orange segments, radishes and celery.
Halve, stone and peel the avocados. Cut into slices. Toss in the lemon juice until well coated, to help prevent discoloration. Add to the salad.
Peel and quarter the eggs. Toss into the salad.
Combine the dressing ingredients in a screw-top jar. Shake together until thoroughly mixed. Pour over the salad. Toss thoroughly until well mixed. Serve immediately.

title: Full of goodness salad
